name: Unitroller
description: ComptrollerCore. storage for the comptroller will be at this address, and cTokens should reference this contract rather than a deployed implementation if.

eventDecorators.name: NewPendingImplementation
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

eventDecorators.name: NewImplementation
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

eventDecorators.name: NewPendingAdmin
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

eventDecorators.name: NewAdmin
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

eventDecorators.name: Failure
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

functionDecorators.name: _setPendingAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Begins transfer of admin rights. The newPendingAdmin must call `_acceptAdmin` to finalize the transfer. Admin function to begin change of admin. The newPendingAdmin must call `_acceptAdmin` to finalize the transfer.

functionDecorators.name: _acceptImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Accepts new implementation of comptroller. msg.sender must be pendingImplementation. Admin function for new implementation to accept it's role as implementation.

functionDecorators.name: _acceptAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Accepts transfer of admin rights. msg.sender must be pendingAdmin. Admin function for pending admin to accept role and update admin.
